text: Beryozovsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Ishtuganovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 4 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 45 km from Meleuz, 7 km from Ishtuganovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Beryozovsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
